english.segment1: Time is slipping away. Days go by, fade away. With one eye opened, one closed. I think you know. Love will make you beautiful. Love will make you beautiful. Thoughts swirl, spinning around. Weary, falling down. When out of the darkness a hand. Reach out. Hold fast
english.segment2: Chorus: Love will make you beautiful. Love will make you beautiful
english.segment3: Turn round this time. Love is there to find. Lift your head and see. Open uo your eyes
